title: Bug 109718: Text item shows tips in one line instead of given format
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN?? ?T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result:
tips should be displayed in the given format

Actual Result:
tips are displayed in one line
OB: When inserting a large content in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format
EB: The tips should be displayed in the expected format, even when the text content is large
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Insert a text item into the layout.
2. Enter the following text as the content of the text item:

"Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7"

3. Save the layout.
4. Put the mouse on the text item to view the tips.

Expected Result:
The tips should be displayed in the expected format, even with the large content.

Actual Result:
The tips are displayed in one line.
